SA09cansisyu:24: kāntāramadhyapatitaḥ kathamāryasārthādbhraṣṭo na śocati ciraṃ supathānabhijñaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:26: muñcanti ye jinaguṇāvalimantarāle vegena te viṣamapātamadhaḥ patanti //
SA09cansisyu:27: Śl_14 ekākino 'pi manasā niyamaṃ prakalpya ye karmaṇā samuditena samunnayanti /
SA09cansisyu:28: te sādhavo bhuvanamaṇḍalamaulibhūtāstaireva yānti gurutāṃ guravaḥ suśiṣyaiḥ //
SA09cansisyu:30: tejasvinaḥ sukhamasūnapi saṃtyajanti satyasthitivyasanino na punaḥ pratijñām //
SA09cansisyu:31: Śl_16 tiṣṭhantu tāvadiha sarvajanāpavādāḥ sarvāśca pāpagatayo nirayāśca ghorāḥ /
SA09cansisyu:32: sadyo jahāti sahajāṃ prakṛtiṃ yadeṣa duḥkhaṃ tataḥ kimaparaṃ bhuvi sajjanasya //
SA09cansisyu:33: Śl_17 yaḥ prapya nāvamiva dharmamayīṃ viśālāṃ bhūyo jahāti padavīṃ munibhiḥ praklṛptām /
SA09cansisyu:35: Śl_18 saṃsāracakramaniśaṃ parivartamānamāruhya yaḥ sukhamavaiti vivartamānaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:36: so 'vaśyameva tarivaśaṃ masaḥ krameṇa sarvāḥ samāśca visamāśca gatīḥ prayāti //
SA09cansisyu:38: āviśya garbhanilayaṃ nirayaṃ yathaiva duḥkhaṃ mahatsa sahate paripiṇḍatāṅgaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:39: Śl_20 kālakramena sa tato dṛḍhatailayantraniṣpīḍyamāna iva yāti bhuvaṃ kathaṃcit /
SA09cansisyu:40: sadyastathāpi yadayaṃ na jahāti jīvaṃ duḥkhopabhogagatidurlabhi tattadeva //
SA09cansisyu:41: Śl_21 tatra sthitaṃ tamaśucau parivartamānamārdrolbaveṣṭitatanuṃ bahalogragandham /

SA09cansisyu:47: Śl_24 sa vihāya munīndrasevitaṃ supathaṃ yātyapathena mohitaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:49: Śl_25 atha tasya balādanicchataḥ śirasi nyastapadā sunirdayam /
SA09cansisyu:50: niśitaṃ palitāṅkuśaṃ jarā kariṇo hastipakīva yacchati //
SA09cansisyu:51: Śl_26 sa tathāpi vijihyaceṣṭitaḥ kuśalenāpi bhayādivojjhitaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:55: Śl_28 vidalanti tato 'sya sanvayo matirutkrāmati hīyate gatiḥ /
SA09cansisyu:56: kṣayameti vapuḥ pariślaṣaṃ niyataṃ vardhata eva jīvitāśā //
SA09cansisyu:58: upagacchati yāmayaṃ daśāṃ narake sā yadi bhīma eva saḥ //

SA09cansisyu:114: yadā tadapi ghaṭṭitaṃ bhavati karmapaṭṭairdṛḍhaistadā viphalavāñchitāḥ kimapi yānti duḥkhāntaram //

SA09cansisyu:120: karmāṇi tatkhalu tathā pariṇāmayanti sarvaṃ yathā paramadāruṇamāvibhāti //

SA09cansisyu:131: Śl_66 āyāti phullakusumaḥ kusumāgamo 'yameṣā śaśāṅkatilakā śaradāgateti /

SA09cansisyu:142: svapnāntadurlabhitavibhramavipralabdhā bālāḥ patanti nirayeṣvapi yeṣu saktāḥ //

SA09cansisyu:147: Śl_74 kāmā viṣaśca viṣayāśca nirūpyamānāḥ śreyo viṣaṃ na viṣayā viṣamasvabhāvāḥ /
SA09cansisyu:148: ekatra janmani viṣaṃ viṣatāṃ prayāti janmāntare 'pi viṣayā viṣatāṃ prayānti //
SA09cansisyu:149: viṣasya viṣayāṇāṃ ca dūramatyantagocaram / upayuktaṃ viṣaṃ hanti viṣayāḥ smaraṇādapi //
SA09cansisyu:150: Śl_75 saṃsṛṣṭaṃ vrajati viṣaṃ viṣeṇa śāntiṃ sanmantrairagadadharaiśca sādhyamānam /
SA09cansisyu:151: yuktaṃ vā bhavati viṣaṃ hitāya nṝṇāṃ na tvevaṃ viṣayamahāviṣaṃ kadācit //
SA09cansisyu:153: śvabhre patatyatha ca nāstu ta eva lābhastadvatsukhānvitamatiḥ khalu jīvalokaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:156: Śl_78 āstīrṇakalpatarupallvasaṃstareṣu kāntāsakhāḥ suravaneṣu makhaṃ vihṛtya /

SA09cansisyu:163: karmānilākulagatiḥ kugatiḥ prayāti ko nāma tatra puruṣo na bhayaṃ bhajeta //

SA09cansisyu:165: duḥkhaṃ paraṃ yadamarā maraṇe vrajanti tanmānavā na jalabudbudalolajīvāḥ //
SA09cansisyu:169: sattvānāṃ bhavajaladhau pariplutānāṃ matsyanāṃ baḍiśamivāntakena dattam //
SA09cansisyu:171: krodhāpūrṇaiḥ subahubhirayomudgaraistāḍyamānā manyate taṃ paramiva sukhaṃ nārakā yadvadeva //

SA09cansisyu:173: mandībhūte kṣaṇamapi nije duḥsahe duḥkhavahnau sarvo lokastanusukhalavagrāmatṛṣṇāṃ karoti //
SA09cansisyu:174: Śl_87 yāvadyāvajjagati sakale jāyate saukhyasaṃjñā tāvattāvadbahutaraśikho jāyate rāgabahniḥ /
SA09cansisyu:175: yāvadyāvadvisarati śubhā bhāvanā bhāvyamānā tāvattāvadbahalataratāmeti mohāndhakāram //
SA09cansisyu:179: tasyānṛtasya phalamugramidaṃ kavīnāṃ tāsveva garbhanilayaṃ padamī viśanti //
SA09cansisyu:180: Śl_90 kā saugatirjagati yā śataśo na yātā kiṃ tatsukhaṃ yadaśakṛnna purānubhūtam /
SA09cansisyu:181: kāstāḥ śriyaścapalacāmaracāruhāsāḥ prāptā na yāstadapi vardhata eva rāgaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:182: Śl_91 nadyo na tā na vihṛtaṃ pulineṣu yāsāṃ sthānaṃ na tajjagati yatra kṛto na vāsaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:183: vyomnāpi tanna padamasti na yatra yātaṃ duṣpūraṇastadapi vardhata eva rāgaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:184: Śl_92 duḥkhaṃ na tadyadasakṛnna purānubhūtaṃ kāmā na te jagati yairiha tṛptirāsīt /
SA09cansisyu:185: sattvo na so 'sti jaṭhare śayitaṃ na yasya saṃsāriṇastadapi nāsti kathaṃ virāgaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:186: Śl_93 atyāyate jagati janmaparigrahe 'sminduḥkhe sukhe ca bahuśaḥ parivartamānaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:187: nāsau jano jagati yo na babhūva bandhurdveṣoragastadapi tiṣṭhati bhīmabhogaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:188: Śl_94 yaiḥ sārdhametya hasitaṃ lalitaṃ pragītamekatra pītamaśitaṃ ca kṛtāśca goṣṭhyaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:189: kālakrameṇa gamitāḥ kati ke 'pi ramyā nītāḥ samāśca viṣamāśca daśāḥ kathaṃcit //
SA09cansisyu:191: saṃsārasāgaragatānapahāya bandhūnekaḥ prayāti yadi nāsti tataḥ kṛtaghnaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:192: Śl_96 aṅkasthitena śiśunā vivaśena yāsāṃ pītaḥ payodhararasaṃ praṇayānuyātaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:194: Śl_97 yā saṃsthito 'yamudare 'pi kṛtāvakāśo yāḥ snehaviklavadhiyaḥ ślathamenamūhuḥ /
SA09cansisyu:195: tā duḥkhitā aśaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇā vihāya ko nāma śatrurapi gantumihotsaheta //

SA09cansisyu:197: kṣaṇaṃ kṣuttṛṣṇoṣṇaśramavigamaramyānarucaḥ paraṃ kṛtvā teṣāmapi yadiha ka ivāsya pratisamaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:198: Śl_99 na sāramyairyā naiva ca nṛpatilakṣmīparikarairna dārairnāpatyairna surabhavane nāsuragatau /
SA09cansisyu:199: kathaṃcitsaṃprāpyaṃ x viṣayasukhaṃ bhogaparamairlabhante yā prītiṃ parahitasukhādhānaniratāḥ //
SA09cansisyu:200: Śl_100 svayaṃ ghāsagrāsaṃ paśurapi karotyeva sulabhaṃ yadṛcchā labdhaṃ vā pibati salilaṃ gāḍhatṛṣitaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:201: parasyārtha kartuṃ yadiha puruṣo 'yaṃ prayatate tadasya svaṃ tejaḥ sukhamidamaho pauruṣamidam //
SA09cansisyu:202: Śl_101 yadālokaṃ kuvan bhramati raviraśrāntaturagaḥ sadālokaṃ dhatte yadagaṇitabhārā vasumatī /
SA09cansisyu:203: na sa svārthaḥ kaścitprakṛtiriyameva mahatāṃ yadete lokānāṃ hitasukharasaikāntarasikāḥ //
SA09cansisyu:205: sphuradvahnijvālā pramathitaśiroveṣṭananibhā yātante ye 'trādbhuta iha puruṣāste sukṛtinaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:206: Śl_103 avīciṃ gāhante hutavahaśikhāpūritamapi prasarpadromāñcā himanikaracandrāṃśuśiśiram /
SA09cansisyu:207: parārthe x x x sphuṭanalinahāsāpi nalinī karotyeṣāṃ tāpaṃ hutavahaśikhāsaṃhatiriva //
SA09cansisyu:208: Śl_104 parahitakaraṇāya baddhakakṣāḥ sukhamasipattravane vasanti santaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:210: Śl_105 aśaraṇajanatāraṇāya tīrṇāḥ punarapi vaitaraṇīṃ taranti dhīrāḥ /
SA09cansisyu:212: Śl_106 iti sucaritaratnaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇānāṃ śivamamṛtamudāraṃ bhāsuraṃ bhāsurāṇām /
SA09cansisyu:213: asulabhamakṛtajñairnandanaṃ nandanānāṃ bhaja samasukhahetuṃ maṅgalaṃ maṅgalānām //
SA09cansisyu:214: Śl_107 sugatavacanapuṣpaṃ sarvadā sevanīyaṃ phalati phalamudāraṃ puṣpameva drumāṇām /
SA09cansisyu:216: Śl_108 visṛja viṣayānnītyākīrṇāṃ kṣaṇavyayasaṅgino bhaja samasukhaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ kṛtāntabhayojjhitam /
SA09cansisyu:217: vikara timiraṃ mohavyājaṃ vimokṣayathārgalaṃ na khalu suciraṃ nidrāyante sadaśvakiśorakāḥ //
SA09cansisyu:218: Śl_109 vinayavisaro vīryaskandhaḥ kṣamādamapallavaḥ śamathakusumaḥ prajñāśākhaḥ pradānaghanacchadaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:219: praṇidhiśikharaḥ śīlacchāyaḥ praśāntiphalaprado bhava bhava marau tāpārtānāṃ tvamekamahādrumaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:221: praśamitarajaḥ śīlacchāyāvibhūṣitabhūtalo bhava bhava marau tāpārtānāṃ tvamekamahāghanaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:222: Śl_111 prakaṭavipulaṃ paṅkāgādhaḥ prasannatarāśrayaḥ satataśiśiro jālavyālapramādavivarjitaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:224: Śl_112 iti nigadatā yadupārjitaṃ puṇyaṃ mayā kiyatsugatacarite kṛtvā śraddhāmanena jano 'khilaḥ /
SA09cansisyu:225: satatasukhito ramyābhogaḥ samṛddhamanorathaḥ parahitarataḥ sarvajñatvaṃ prayātu tataḥ śanaiḥ //
SA09cansisyu:226: Śl_113 karatalasamāḥ spaṣṭālokāḥ praśāntakṛśānavaḥ sthalakamalinīpattracchannā bisāṅkuradanturāḥ /
SA09cansisyu:227: śucisurabhayaḥ sphullāmbhojairvibhūṣitabhūmayo dadhatu narakāḥ sphītāṃ śobhāṃ saśīkaravāyavaḥ //
SA09cansisyu:228: Śl_114 vijitaṃvirutamārānīkāḥ kṛtābhayaghoṣaṇā gaganasalilakrīḍā ramyā sameta narāmarāḥ /
SA09cansisyu:229: jananamaraṇakleśāyāsaprabandhavighātino diśi diśi sadā buddhotpādā bhavantu samīhitāḥ //
SA09cansisyu:230: Śl_115 bhavatu jagatāṃ dharmāmodaḥ prabandhamahotsavaḥ suciraguṇitā mṛtyorbandhyā bhavantu manorathāḥ /
SA09cansisyu:231: munijanakathāgoṣṭhībandhaiḥ samāvṛtavarṣibhiḥ satataśiśiraḥ subhagacandrālokaḥ prayātu kṛtārthatām //
